description: The kraft paper backing from lightweight gypsum wallboard.
short desc: The kraft paper backing from lightweight gypsum wallboard.
source: Samples ground from pieces cut from 1.28 cm thick, 1.2 m by 2.4 cm commercially available sheet.

measured property.test description: Mass loss rate [kg/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
